title: Pillow That Hurts
description: A portable pillow with spikes. It is used at home when a person is laying down during a day or sitting in the chair. It is used to reduce fatigue, boost the mood, and more.

title: Monk In Your Ears
description: A library of sounds and voices that a person can carry with them. It is used as an educational tool. Person listens to instructions on how to breathe slowly and experience feelings such as awareness, gratitude, and more.

title: Virtual Pet
description: A mini game that a person can carry with them. It is used as an educational tool. Person is reminded to register their repeatable actions on this tool many times throughout a day and in exchange the person receives virtual rewards that boost their mood.

title: Mask for Sleep
description: A fashionable piece worn on the head to cover the eyes. It is used during sleep. It reduces the light entering human eyes and helps to enjoy a feeling of darkness.

title: White Mud Boots
description: A fashionable piece worn on the feet. It is used not just for rainy days but also when a person is anxious about insects outside.

title: Noise Protector
description: A multi-purpose device worn on the head to cover the ears. It is used for sleep, during walks in the city and at work. It helps to cancel the noise and enjoy the silence.
